name: Time To Stop Time
description:
Time To Stop Time is a first-person superhero action. You’re given the power to control time and a huge responsibility to save every innocent person from the imminent danger. There is only one minute to analyse the situation and navigate through a storm of falling debris, bullets and explosions.

Choose your own solution for each situation and find the most creative way to resolve an imminent crisis!

  • Time-frozen physics

    Change the trajectory of moving bullets to send them back. Throw and move different objects to create a path or improvised weapons.

  • Extreme surfing

    Jump on a rocket or a tank shell, turning it into an explosive hoverboard.

  • 40+ Time Sandbox Levels

    From simple bar brawls to saving the President — each level is unique and it’s up to you how to solve its puzzles.

  • Tactical kicking

    Accelerate objects or your enemies with a good kick.

  • Superhuman cannonball

    Use a cannon to fire off objects and ride them to your destination.

  • Fastest Wrestling Entertainment

    Utilise different wrestling moves to take down enemies with style.

  • Level Editor

    Create the most challenging scenarios and share them with other players — to find out who is the ultimate speedster superhero.
